attributes.action: All MPs to be banned from Social Media
attributes.additional_details: MP’s use Twitter, Facebook and Instagram not for good things but for one upmanship, influential uses, they spread the wrong message. MPs should not be using social media to damn one another
attributes.background: All MPs are not to use Twitter, Facebook instagram so that they cannot call-out, blame, lie etc to the public

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to use social media are a matter for individual MPs, not the UK Government or Parliament.
